BodAsh61.First Lines:
Ihesu lord blyssed þu beffor All þat nyght þu hast
                    me kepeffrom þe fend & his posteWheþer I wake or
                    þat I slepe…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…ffrom All euyll sprytes þu me defendAnd in my desesys to
                    be my socoure
BodAsh61.Editions:
Brown,  John Thomas Toshach. 
             “The Poems of David Rate, Confessor of King James the First of
                Scotland.” 
             Scottish Antiquary
         17 (1903): 36: 36.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 195-6.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 72-3; 452-4; 602.

CamTCC601.First Lines:
[I]N nomine patris & filijEt spiritus sancti
                    AmenMercy Ihesu and gramercyMy body and soule I the
                    beken…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…ffrom euyll spyrtes thow me defendeAnd in my desease be my
                    socour Amen
CamTCC601.Attributed Title: A deuout prayer at thy vprysyng (f. 276va)
